text: The Patria institute was established in Argentina in 2016, by Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. She ended her term of office as President of Argentina in 2015, and this institute works as the headquarters of her political activity since then. Former members of her cabinet have offices in the institute as well, such as Oscar Parrilli, Carlos Zannini and Teresa Parodi. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:2016 establishments in Argentina Category:Cristina Fernández de Kirchner
title: Patria institute
